title: Hextech crafting not rewarding new content
body:
After unlocking all my PROJECT stuff and opening my 10 augment caches I had a lot of skin shards to re-roll. On my second to last re-roll I got Forecast Janna and I was so excited, but when I clicked to add the skin into my collection it instead went into my skin inventory inside hextech crafting. I double checked and I know something is wrong. The skin shard is "legendary skin permanent" and it has an "Owned" status when I hover it and the gold border around it. But when I looked in the shop I confirmed that I already owned Forecast Janna. It came from a 3 shard re-roll so it has to be a skin I don't own and it should have been unlocked automatically. Why did I get a shard for something I already have?

edit: After going through purchased content and tracking that skin down I realized that it unlocked Forecast Janna but gave me the shard back as permanent. The first time I went through my shop it appeared as I didn't own the skin, the same thing under champions tab but after refreshing a few times it appears as owned in both locations. It still doesn't explain why I got the shard after the re-roll....

replies.body:
This is a very interesting situation. I took a quick look at your account, but I'm not quite sure what to make of it. I'm confident that our accounts specialist will be able to investigate further and work with you to resolve this. [Submit a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be happy to assist further.

Let me know if you have any questions.
